description.en:
1) Boy’s Lips  
Narina accidentally kissed a sleeping boy in their school clinic and now she can't get him out of her mind. She later learns that his name is Yasuda and sees him roughed up. When they meet again, Narina is startled by Yasuda's kindness. But before she can figure out her feelings for him, Narina sees her teacher, Sugiyama, warning Yasuda off her. How will she be able to handle the situation, especially now that she knows that her teacher has special feelings for her?  
  
2) Boy Poisoning  
Harada Sayaka bought a potion from the neighboring boys school's chemistry club, which they no long make. Unfortunately for her she has become addicted to it. Leaving her to chase after one of the members, Fujikawa Shuujei, to get him to produce the main ingredient… his tears. Which, obviously, he is not too keen on doing.  
  
3) Electrocuting September  
Kayama is the last of the class to experience Koba's exciting talent, and the class is taking bets to see how long she can resist it… the electric shock of the cold and collected Koba.  
  
4) Emerging Cicada  
The story of two boys, Shin and Kazushi, who are both hospitalized around the same time for different reasons.
description.pl:
Zbiór one-shotów, składający się z 4 historii:  
1. Chłopięce usta - co może spowodować przypadkowy pocałunek?  
2. Narkotyk - "składniki: chłopięce łzy i woda sodowa. Oto narkotyk, który zapewni ci ogromną przyjemność"…  
3. Wstrząsający wrzesień - wstrząs elektryczny i miłość. Co mają ze sobą wspólnego?  
4. Świt cykady - historia o przyjaźni dwóch młodych chłopców
